author: m.kalinin
content:
The first `engine_executePayload` method call that communicates a valid payload to EL initiates the Merge transition. Then the first `POS_FORKCHOICE_UPDATED` event (in a form of `engine_forkchoiceUpdated` method call) that finalizes the first communicated payload finishes the transition. 

After the Merge transition gets finalized the Merge may be considered as happened.
